CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: "Nearly Ten Thousand Pittsburgh and Vicinity Homemakers jammed the walls of beautiful Syria Mosque in Oakland to thrill to three days of dazzling displays, exquisite exhibits, expert food demonstrations and loads of fun and entertainment at the Pittsburgh Courier's fourth annual Home Service Fair, June 22-24...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Jessie Vann wearing plaid dress speaking into microphone on platform with Louise Protho and Betty Stokes and two men standing in display for Norge appliances in Syria Mosque for 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
